036582d728d2e2bb37f360bb3a74f899f04d587d.commitMessage: Issue #4370: Add multi thread mode to checkstyle launcher

ce21086e087661553f3a774c38362327ee88996a.commitMessage: Issue #3763: Try to avoid non-jdk runtime exceptions in code

b43c32ad0a3674fcda782d2e28d0975b72382470.commitMessage:
Use same parameter names in overridden methods. #1555

Fixes some `ParameterNameDiffersFromOverriddenParameter` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports parameters that have different names from the corresponding parameters in the methods they override. While legal in Java, such inconsistent names may be confusing, and lessen the documentation benefits of good naming practices.

subchanges.commitMessage:
Use same parameter names in overridden methods. #1555

Fixes some `ParameterNameDiffersFromOverriddenParameter` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports parameters that have different names from the corresponding parameters in the methods they override. While legal in Java, such inconsistent names may be confusing, and lessen the documentation benefits of good naming practices.

Use same parameter names in overridden methods. #1555

Fixes some `ParameterNameDiffersFromOverriddenParameter` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports parameters that have different names from the corresponding parameters in the methods they override. While legal in Java, such inconsistent names may be confusing, and lessen the documentation benefits of good naming practices.

ba16b1537f68ce77dd09a25b85a11c1e7ecffe75.commitMessage:
Do not ignore stacktrace of previous exception. #1555

Fixes `ExceptionFromCatchWhichDoesntWrap` inspection violation.

Description:
>Reports exceptions constructed and thrown from inside catch blocks, which do not "wrap" the caught exception. It is considered good practice when throwing an exception in response to an exception to wrap the initial exception, so that valuable context information such as stack frames and line numbers are not lost.
